ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def OnViewExecute(command, entity): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNLancamentoCodigoInterno from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNDocumento
documento = FNDocumento.Get(entity.Fields["DOCUMENTO"])
command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["ENTIDADEORIGEM"] = documento
if(documento.Fields["ENTRADASAIDA"] == "S"): command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = FNLancamentoCodigoInterno.ciFAT else: command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = FNLancamentoCodigoInterno.ciFATD
command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["SOMENTELEITURA"] = True

def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.ERP.Comum import Utils
widget.View.FieldDefinitions["CUSTOM_ACAO_ELEMENTO"].Visible = Utils.EhOrcamentoPublicoComControleAcao()
